This makes sure that sub-classes implement it.

protected abtract void handleResponseInternal(final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher);

This makes sure that sub-classes implement it.
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: This is on purpose. Not all subclasses need to override this method, so it is empty by default.
replies.author: druciak

replies.bodyText: I guess that‘s a personal style question. I prefer „deliberately implement to do nothing in subclass“ over „accidentally forget to implement doing something“. But ok with me.
replies.author: J-N-K
